messageJson.content: I am capable of analyzing corporate finance, formulating management strategies, and simulating future values. Additionally, I have experience in proposing regional revitalization plans using analysis methods such as GHIL, SWOT, and customer journey mapping.
I possess expertise in developing web applications and mobile apps using Flutter.
I have experience using Python for tasks such as data analysis, data visualization through graphics, and constructing a model of the Department of Mechanics.
I have expertise in building web applications applications and websites using Node.js and React.js.
